div.h5: A drawing field where you with your hand

div.label: How many roof surfaces
Is a permit required
Year of construction of the house
Have you ever had any leaks or other problems with your roof?
Is it a rent or buy property?
String 1 (Note: always 6 panels or more in 1 string)
String 2 (Note: always 6 panels or more in 1 string)

h3.u: Accessibility of the home and the roof

div.label: Is there a free space for scaffolding?
Is a special provision required (telehandler / lift / aerial platform)
What is the condition of the surface on which the scaffolding is placed?
What is the accessibility of the rear
Use must be made of the public road for the erection of scaffolding or facilities
Access to the roof / territory of the neighbors is required

select.name: xaa_aa_access_roof_neighbors

option.value: Ja maar er is nog geen toestemming
option.t-att-selected: formulier_id.xaa_aa_access_roof_neighbors == 'Ja maar er is nog geen toestemming'

select.option: Ja maar er is nog geen toestemming

div.label: Walking distance from bus to roof access
Is there an extension / obstacle present that hinders the direct installation of scaffolding or roof lift?
What type (s) of roof is it?
What is the condition of the roof?
Is asbestos incorporated in the roof? And is the customer aware of the consequences?

select.name: xaa_aa_asbestos_incorporated_roof

option.value: ja klant op de hoogte van de gevogen
option.t-att-selected: formulier_id.xaa_aa_asbestos_incorporated_roof == 'ja klant op de hoogte van de gevogen'

select.option: ja klant op de hoogte van de gevogen

option.value: ja klant niet op de hoogte van de gevogen
option.t-att-selected: formulier_id.xaa_aa_asbestos_incorporated_roof == 'ja klant niet op de hoogte van de gevogen'

select.option: ja klant niet op de hoogte van de gevogen

div.label: What is the height of the gutter?
What is the slope?
What type (s) of roofing is it?
Are the pans screwed or hooked?
Is there gravel on the roof?
What type (s) of roofing is it?
Is there a roof terminal for the string cabling

select.name: xaa_aa_roof_terminal_cabling

option.value: Nee klant draagt hier zorg voor
option.t-att-selected: formulier_id.xaa_aa_roof_terminal_cabling == 'Nee klant draagt hier zorg voor'

select.option: Nee klant draagt hier zorg voor

div.label: Location of the inverter
Is there sufficient free space around the inverter for cooling / ventilation purposes?
Is a sturdy rear wall available?
Can a washing machine connection be used?
Can an empty pipe be used?
Description cable route panels -> inverter
Description cable inverter -> meter box
Description UTP cable converter -> meter box
Does the customer want to mount a cable himself?
When using an existing cable what is the diameter of the cable?
The internet connection can be wired
Is there any entrepreneurship?
Does the name (incl. Initials) on the energy bill / contract match the name on the quote?
Do you fall under VAT exemption rules?
Do you need other preservation products?
Other special agreements with client
Note
